format: This data frame contains the following columns:
description:
Description
The record times in 2000 for 77 Scottish long distance
races.  We
believe the data are, for the most part, trustworthy.  However,
the dist variable for Caerketton (record 58) seems
to have been variously recorded as 1.5 mi and 2.5 mi.
title: Scottish Hill Races Data - 2000

parameters.type:
a factor, with levels indicating type of race, 
i.e. hill, marathon, relay, uphill or other
parameters.timef: record time in hours for females
parameters.climb: total height gained during the route, in feet
